jpo
Class GroupInfoEditor

java.lang.Object
  jpo.GroupInfoEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class GroupInfoEditor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

class that creates a Frame and allows the field(s) of a group to be edited. It seems to run in it's own thread because it creates a frame and those objects are waiting on input on the main event queue.
